import React,{useState} from 'react' import './Booking.css'; import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from 'reactstrap'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Booking = ({tour, avgRating}) => { const {price, reviews} = tour; const navigate = useNavigate() const [ credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ userId: '01', userEmail:'example@gmail.com', fullName:'', phone:'', guestSize:1, bookAt:'', }) const handleChange = e => { setCredentials(prev=>({...prev, [e.target.id]:e.target.value})); }; const serviceFee = 500; const totalAmout = Number(price) * Number(credentials.guestSize) + Number(serviceFee); const handleClick =e=>{ e.preventDefault(); nav }; return (

₹{price} /per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
{/*======================== Booking Form ======================*/}
Information
₹{price}1 person
₹{price}
Service charge
₹{serviceFee}
Total
₹{totalAmout}
) } export default Booking
